title: Move Your Body Lyrics Vai Raja Vai Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Move Your Body
Singer: Ilaiyaraaja
Movie: Vai Raja Vai
Music: Yuvan
Lyrics: Dhanush

Kaalam Porandhidichu
Kaaththu thirumbidichu
kaasu neranjidichu nanba vaadaa

Maegam pozhinjiichu
yogam adichirichu
paadha amanjirichu
nanbaa vaadaa

Pagaivanani jeyichaachu
tholachaachu,
ye nanbaa vaadaa

Kadangalai mudichaachu
kazhichchaachu
ye nanbaa vaadaa

Ada nethu illa
naalai illa
nethu indru naalai
enbadhu enakillai

Hey nanbaa
ada ada nanbaa
Naan eppavumey raajaathaanda

Move your move your
move body
Move your move your
move body
mov mov mov move your
mov mov mov move your
move your body

Puncture aaana wheelaa
enna padacha
en cycle tubea serthu
neethaan kizhichcha

naan unna mattum yaeno
nambi thozhachen
en vazhkaiyoda guide-a
nee yendhaan thozhachcha

Ishtathukku vidhiya ezhudhivacha
kashtathukku cousin-ah
porakka vachcha

Ulagaththula
porandhaalum nashtam illa
Irandhaalum nashtam illa

Edhukkaaga vandhomnu
neeye neeye yosi

Move your move your
move body - Ok Ma
Move your move your
move body

Kaasu irundhaa
kaasu irundhaa
daily night  party

Lets shower with money
yeah
floating in money money

Hey
adhirshtam adichchaa
edhuvum nadakkum
mazhai penjaa
vaanam koda pidikkum

Onakkum pudhushaa
ulagam porakkum
adhula unakkellaam amanjirukkum

Enakkum ippo
kaasu undu
kaadhal undu
kalaiyaadha kanavum undu
personallaa enakku
dhevadhaigal undu

Nanbaa ye nanba
idhu namakku mattum

Unadhu vidhiyayai
